name: Kaia Gojin
text: Atomic Pulse — When you enter combat, deal 1 damage to all enemies. Burn (5): Ignite all enemies, dealing 2 damage per turn for two turns. Pierce (3): Ignore enemy Shields and deal +4 direct damage. Curse (2): Inflict meltdown on one enemy; their next attack deals half damage.

do.note: Atomic Pulse splash on entering combat
Ignite all enemies for two turns
Apply burn status for two turns
Pierce through Shields for direct damage
Curse meltdown halves their next attack damage

flavor: Cities tremble, oceans boil, and still she stands—radiant, unstoppable, alive.
